title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
07:39 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:49 <vmassol> good morning  
07:49 <@cjdelisle> good morning  
07:49 <vmassol> seems sergiu broke the build during the night :) http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-core/  
07:50 <vmassol> ah checkstyle, fixing them  
08:28 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:29 <jstoldt> has joined #xwiki  
08:29 <jstoldt> good morning :)  
08:34 <vmassol> morning!  
08:37 <@cjdelisle> good morning  
08:38 <vmassol> ok build stil failing for other reasons now  
08:38 <vmassol> not compiling  
08:38 <vmassol> sergiu moved some deprecation to aspect but forgot to update usages  
08:39 <@cjdelisle> "\* Jenkins: Kohsuke and all other committers forked and renamed Hudson since there were trademarks issues with Oracle"  
08:39 <@cjdelisle> lol  
08:39 <@cjdelisle> Wonder how long before we see yourSQL  
08:39 <vmassol> :)  
08:41 <@cjdelisle> Gotta love FOSS, buy it up, everyone goes somewhere else.  
08:42 <@cjdelisle> /home/hudsonagent/hudson\_root/workspace/xwiki-platform-core/trunk/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/render/groovy/XWikiGroovyRenderer.java:[225,38] cannot find symbol  
08:42 <@cjdelisle> symbol  : method getFormEncoded(java.lang.String)  
08:42 <@cjdelisle> location: class com.xpn.xwiki.XWiki  
08:42 <@cjdelisle> /home/hudsonagent/hudson\_root/workspace/xwiki-platform-core/trunk/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/diff/DiffPlugin.java:[92,20] cannot find symbol  
08:42 <@cjdelisle> symbol  : method getXMLEncoded(java.lang.String)  
08:43 <@cjdelisle> location: class com.xpn.xwiki.XWiki  
08:43 <vmassol> yes that's what I was saying  
08:43 <vmassol> sergiu moved that method to the compat aspect  
08:43 <vmassol> so we need to update the calls to use the other non deprecated usage  
08:43 <@cjdelisle> Oh, I still really don't understand aj.  
08:44 <vmassol> @deprecated Use $escapetool.xml  
08:45 <vmassol> however I don't think its correct to use an escape tool in java code  
08:45 <@cjdelisle> getXMLEncoded != escapetool.xml  
08:45 <vmassol> well that's what sergiu wrote  
08:45 <@cjdelisle> getXMLEncoded ruins ' marks, escapetool does not.  
08:45 <vmassol> so we need to ask him  
08:45 <vmassol> why he said this  
08:46 <vmassol> maybe it's better for ' not to be ruined  
08:46 <@cjdelisle> It is but IMO behavior is behavior.  
08:46 <vmassol> yes but we're in 3.0  
08:46 <vmassol> we're allowed to break behavior if we think it's not going to cause major issues  
08:47 <vmassol> but I agree we need to be careful  
08:47 <vmassol> very careful  
08:47 <@cjdelisle>  @deprecated Use $escapetool.xml <-- I thought you meant to say the aspectj version redirects to escapetool.  
08:47 <vmassol> btw  
08:47 <vmassol> the getXMLEncoded impl redirect to escape tool  
08:47 <vmassol> so it's going to be the same behavior for sure  
08:48 <@cjdelisle> I get it now. Also I think I wrote the line "@deprecated please use escapetool because it does not ruin ' marks"  
08:48 <vmassol> ah no he changed it  
08:48 <vmassol> see rev 34391  
08:49 <vmassol> http://xwiki.markmail.org/thread/6zia5dafhr3zav2e  
08:50 <@cjdelisle> We talked about it at the time and decided that we should keep behavior, deprecate, and change the .vm files.  
08:50 <@cjdelisle> +     \* Transform a text in a XML compatible text This method uses Apache CharacterFilter which swaps single quote  
08:50 <@cjdelisle> +     \* (') for left single quotation mark (’)  
08:50 <@cjdelisle> ^that was my comment  
08:50 <vmassol> then we need to ask him why he did this  
08:51 <@cjdelisle> Perhaps it saves us having to include/class load CharacterFilter?  
08:52 <@cjdelisle> bbiab, trying to understand why a thread unlocks a lock twice.  
08:55 <vmassol> hmm activity stream not working when creating new wikis on myxwiki.org  
08:55 <vmassol> my guess is it's PR issue  
08:56 <vmassol> indeed that's it  
08:56 <@cjdelisle> Have you heard about my new security function? It's drop PR for every user forever.  
08:56 <vmassol> so the template is wrong  
08:56 <vmassol> fixing it  
08:56 <@cjdelisle> It makes sure noone can do anything bad until the server is reset :D  
08:57 <vmassol> now home pages are going to be much slower on myxwiki.org....  
09:01 <vmassol> hmmm AS also doesn't respect scope on myxwiki.org  
09:01 <vmassol> it displays activity for all wikis!  
09:01 <vmassol> ah no  
09:01 <vmassol> my bad  
09:01 <vmassol> that's on my profile  
09:01 <vmassol> :)  
09:05 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <vmassol> hmmm seems there's a new bug, sburjan could you confirm it? It goes like this:  
09:19 <vmassol> create a new wiki in a farm, remove the admin user so that there's no user in the admin group  
09:20 <vmassol> the admin group disappears from the UI  
09:20 <vmassol> thus making it impossible to add a new user to the admin group  
09:20 <vmassol> (from the ui)  
09:20 <vmassol> I've noticed this on myxwiki.org  
09:20 <vmassol> thus on a 2.6 version  
09:21 <+sburjan> okay. on what version do you want me to test and confirm ?  
09:21 <vmassol> latest  
09:21 <+sburjan> okay  
09:21 <+sburjan> I'll have to finish something then I'll install a farm to test  
09:21 <@cjdelisle> I think that is an old performance hack in XHS which was broken when I stopped the caching on save.  
09:21 <vmassol> to make ure we don't have it in M2  
09:21 <vmassol> 3.0M2  
09:22 <+sburjan> in 4 hours tops you'll have an answer  
09:22 <@cjdelisle> sdumitriu will know if it is the same issue.  
09:22 <vmassol> sure ok thanks  
09:22 <+sburjan> have to finish the AQ plan  
09:22 <+sburjan> \*QA  
09:22 <vmassol> actually I'll probably upgrade myxwiki.org to 3.0M1  
09:22 <@cjdelisle> I can have a patch for that over the weekend.  
09:23 <@cjdelisle> (hack on top of the hack)  
09:28 <vmassol> cjdelisle: hmm I cannot even add a XWikiGroups object to the XWikiAdminGroup page  
09:29 <vmassol> after I save it's revmoed  
09:30 <vmassol> maybe I need to add the right to the user class first  
09:30 <vmassol> trying that  
09:30 <@cjdelisle> The object is there, XHS just doesn't load it.  
09:32 <@cjdelisle> XHS loads group objects separately from any other objects.  
09:32 <@cjdelisle> IMO it smells like an emergency patch.  
09:32 <vmassol> hmmm my user doesn't have admin rights  
09:33 <@cjdelisle> loadXWikiObject() is slow and groups are the largest objects so XHS.loadXWikiDoc loads groups the way the patch I wrote would have loaded everything.  
09:33 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <@cjdelisle> Except it doesn't actually load anything unless the group has members.  
09:35 <@cjdelisle> But it was covered up because documents were cached when they were saved so they allowed the user a chance to add members before their group vanished.  
09:35 <@cjdelisle> sdumitriu mentioned this to me a few weeks back but I was really busy getting attachments done. I will make time to patch this over the weekend.  
09:36 <vmassol> ok  
09:36 <vmassol> in the meantime I'd like to uprgade myxwiki.org to 3.0M1, ok with everyone here?  
09:36 <@cjdelisle> No changed on my end (at all I think).  
09:37 <vmassol> doesn't compute, can you reformulate?  
09:37 <vmassol> :)  
09:37 <@cjdelisle> I can't have broken anything because I didn't change anything ---> go ahead.  
09:38 <vmassol> ok  
09:38 <vmassol> jvelociter: ok for you too?  
09:39 <vmassol> (asking since you're plarform admin)  
09:54 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:22 <vmassol> restarting myxwiki.org  
10:29 <+jvelociter> vmassol: fine with me  
10:36 <vmassol> has quit  
10:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <vmassol> back (lost internet)  
10:41 <vmassol> myxwiki.org restarted, now need to upgrade the XARs....  
11:05 <abusenius> has quit  
11:09 <vmassol> jvdrean: I'm doing step 13.1 of http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Upgrading  
11:09 <vmassol> "If needed, upgrade the wiki-manager and application-manager applications by installing their corresponding new XARs. Here too, be careful of what you override."  
11:09 <vmassol> what pages should I exclude?  
11:10 <+jvdrean> weird, I think you can override everything safely  
11:10 <vmassol> ok  
11:11 <vmassol> jvdrean: ouch… http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
11:11 <vmassol> ah that must be my merge  
11:11 <vmassol> checking admin.vm  
11:15 <vmassol> ok fixed  
11:15 <vmassol> was me  
11:19 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:20 <vmassol> hmm seems like the wiki manager doesn't work anymore in 3.0M1  
11:20 <vmassol> http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/WikiManager/CreateNewWiki  
11:20 <vmassol> maybe caused by the velocity upgrade  
11:37 <vmassol> there's still the import problem with PR  
11:37 <vmassol> jvdrean, jvelociter: I thought you fixed it?  
11:38 <+jvdrean> which problem ?  
11:39 <vmassol> for ex the Main.Activity page doesn't have PR after the XE XAR import  
11:39 <vmassol> I just imported it on template.myxwiki.org  
11:39 <vmassol> I had to save the page explciity after the import to get PR  
11:39 <+jvdrean> it seems you imported it while logged as local admin  
11:39 <vmassol> I was logged with my user  
11:39 <+jvdrean> or as backup pack  
11:40 <vmassol> I have used the default settings except for reset to 1.1  
11:40 <vmassol> backup back is default AFAIK  
11:40 <vmassol> s/backup back/backup pack/  
11:40 <+jvdrean> you need to uncheck the backup pack checkbox  
11:40 <vmassol> hmmm people will never do that  
11:41 <vmassol> at least for us we need to upgrade the upgrade guides then  
11:42 <vmassol> + it means all pages will have me as creator ;)  
11:46 <+lucaa> why do you need Main.Activity to have PR?  
11:46 <+lucaa> is it the default main.activity?  
11:46 <+jvelociter> yes  
11:46 <vmassol> yes  
11:46 <+jvelociter> it needs PR  
11:46 <+lucaa> since when?  
11:46 <vmassol> forever?  
11:47 <+lucaa> why?  
11:47 <+jvelociter> don't know why, probably for using a priviledged search API  
11:47 <vmassol> (maybe it's admin rights it needs I don't know but it needs to be resaved)  
11:47 <@cjdelisle> {{signed}}{{signed}}{{signed}}{{signed}}{{signed}}  
11:48 <+jvelociter> well that would be new, a document that needs to be saved with admin rights  
11:48 <+lucaa> then I shouldn't worry anymore that annotations docs need to be resaved with pr...  
11:48 <+jvelociter> I'm going to add the RequiredRightClass for M2  
11:48 <+jvelociter> I'm going to do that today actually  
11:48 <+lucaa> I don't think it's forever, though...  
11:49 <vmassol> we need to remove any need for PR as much as possible from the default XAR  
11:49 <vmassol> even when there'll be the signed macro caleb is talking about  
11:51 <@cjdelisle> {{signed}} will offer us other options too like the ability to support deprecated api without it being in the main trunk, just drop in the script and it adds something like getXMLEncoded back in.  
11:51 <@cjdelisle> ofc we would have to allow sneeky subclassing of api classes on the fly.  
11:52 <+jvelociter> cjdelisle: that's already possible with groovy  
11:52 <+jvelociter> it's a one liner  
11:52 <@cjdelisle> That could work the other way too, trick subclassing to make security flawed functions go away.  
11:53 <+jvelociter> http://groovy.codehaus.org/Dynamic+Groovy  
11:54 <@cjdelisle> hmm.  
11:54 <@cjdelisle> groovy ugh. Why did they have to gut everything that made java safe and awesome.  
11:58 <+sburjan> vmassol: I small suggestion. Could you remove "XPXML" project from all XE/XEM/Platform filters on JIRA ? I get some errors because that project doesn't exist. It will be a very minor improvement  
12:00 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <@cjdelisle> Here's a crazy idea, a java preprocessor.  
12:01 <@cjdelisle> Not like the evil c preprocessor.  
12:02 <vmassol> ok upgrade done for myxwiki.org  
12:02 <vmassol> now need to fix the wiki manager....  
12:02 <@cjdelisle> It would look at objects that you create in a function which are unreferneced by the end of that function and replace those with large groups of primatives.  
12:02 <vmassol> ouch my blog didn't like the upgrade it seems: http://massol.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/  
12:03 <@cjdelisle> aka replace each field in the object with a primative in the function.  
12:03 <@cjdelisle> primatives are allocated on the stack --> faster  
12:04 <+jvelociter> strange, colors of my blog changed with the upgrade  
12:06 <vmassol> hmm fixed by import the new blog app  
12:06 <vmassol> so we broke something with the date

12:36 <jstoldt> O\_o just got a 111 connection refused error while trying to access l10n.xwiki.org

12:39 <@cjdelisle> Re: [xwiki-devs] Upgrade Hudson to Jenkins 1.396? <-- almost gotta feel bad for Oracle, you gotta know everyone everywhere is doing exactly the same thing.  
12:40 <@cjdelisle> Hudson will be dead or proprietary within a year.  
12:41 <vmassol> sonatype is mudding the water though  
12:41 <jstoldt> question is how it will affect their business in the end  
12:41 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
12:41 <vmassol> muddying  
12:41 <vmassol> lunch!  
12:41 <jstoldt> bon appetite

13:58 <vmassol> yes
